#include<stdio.h>
#define ll long long
ll int hcf(ll int a,ll int b)
{
    if (b == 0)
        return a;
    return hcf(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
    ll int t;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        ll int a,b,gcd,x,temp = 0;
        scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b);
        gcd = hcf(a,b);
        //printf("%lld",gcd);
        x = gcd;
        while(1)
        {
            a = x;
            b = b / x;
            if(b == 1)
            {
                temp = 1;
                break;
            }
            x = hcf(a,b);
            if(x == 1)
            {
                temp = 0;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(temp == 1)
            printf("Yes\n");
        else printf("No\n");
    }
}
